select_number_title: Please let us know which phone number to verify via SMS or voice call.
confirm_number_subtitle1: You will immediately receive an SMS to the number you have given
confirm_number_subtitle2: Please enter the popular 5-digit code to create your user account.
call_method1: Choose your favorite method to the number you provided
create_company_profile_descr: Let us know how your company can be reached by post.
user_account_created_description: You have successfully created your user account and therefore only have one more step to gain access to Hamster's BusinessTerminal.
max_length_reached: The maximum number of characters has been reached
min_length_field: The minimum number of characters was not reached
for_credits_and_regular_billing: For credits and regular billing, we still need your bank details and consent to the direct debit procedure
i_authorize_collect_payment: I authorize Hamster Systems AG to collect payments from my account by direct debit. At the same time, I instruct my bank to redeem the direct debits drawn by Hamster Systems AG on my account. By accepting this agreement, Hamster Systems AG undertakes to im to the same extent on the payment of credit to the above account
